name: ViewQwest
exp_list: Collaborated closely with team and BA's to create accessible standard features that aligned, develop and best practices.
Developed a scalable web application using React and Laravel, applying S.O.L.I.D principles to enhance code readability, maintainability and reuseable function.
Optimization and maintained, integration and load test to ensure reliability and performance.
Code & design for new development project and existing by improving and optimizing the UI components for better performance and user experience.
Improved backend efficiency through query optimization, reducing load times and increasing scalability.
